name: Ascendant's Roguelike
description:
Grow your enemies to become stronger yourself and Ascend faster the more power you gain!

I'm a small indie developer whos dreamt about making a roguelike and the reason for that is I want to take as much crazy stuff recommended from the community and add it bit by bit. I plan to update this game as I grow and learn new skills throughout the years. I plan to jam as much content as possible into this and make it a game I'm proud of in the future


Im going to be adding a whole array of things from new enemies abilities bloodlines evolutions spells and all that fun stuff. Up to the community to see what is favored more.
